EmailTemplate.description: This is the email that will go out when the "Talk to us" form is submitted
EmailTemplate.name: Talk to us
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for your interest in talking to us {{First Name:default=at MBO Partners}}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{First Name:default=Sir/Maddam}},
Thank you for taking the time to contact MBO Partners.Â My name is {{Enrollment Manager:default=Steve Arhancet}}, an MBO Partners Enrollment Manager, and I will reach out to you within one business day.
If you prefer, you can easily schedule a phone appointment with me by clicking here: [INSERT TT LINK].
I look forward to speaking with you!
Best regards,
{{Enrollment Manager:default=Steve Arhancet}} [INSERT FOOTER}
